JSHint Configration¶

The ui gem repository contains a standard .jshintrc for use with Yottaa projects.

See:

  • Install JSHint
  • JSHint options

Intergration With VIM¶

Manually run JSHint with a hotkey

" vimrc
noremap <F2> <ESC>:JSHint<CR>

Auto run JSHint with Syntastic plugin when saving file

" vimrc
Plugin 'Syntastic'
let g:syntastic_javascript_checkers = ['jshint']
